Currently the date is displayed in german.

data.author: Maxwell Moseley
data.description:
See a full week pass with WeeklyRing!

A full 7-day week is expressed as a circle starting on Sunday, while the hours, minutes, day of week, and date is expressed digitally. After 6PM, the dark theme is enabled for easier viewing in the dark.

BONUS: To put your week into perspective, the current week number is displayed below the time.

Please HEART if you enjoy this free watchface!

latest_release.release_notes: Now with PT2 support!

data.author: xcsrz

changelog.release_notes: Several bug fixes and improvements, including:  Fixed 12/24 hour setting bug; 12/24 hour now reflects the pebble Time & Date setting;  Swapped config site for Pebble Clay (enabling faster and offline access to settings); Updates to package format to conform to SDK 3 format (for anyone who wants to help me refine and add features to this).
Fixed the am/pm logic for digital display
Color and watch options work.  Only the MB model is included.

data.description:
A Pebble Time watchface themed for jeep folk.  Currently there is only one model (1941 MB), but more are coming. Configurable options include:

 - full customized color for body, time and background
 - 12 and 24 hour clock
 - morse code clock
 - binary clock
 - battery < 20 indicator (right headlight)
 - bluetooth not connected indicator (left headlight)

More features in the works.  It's open source on github and I will gladly review pull requests if there's a feature you'd like to add.

latest_release.release_notes: Several bug fixes and improvements, including:  Fixed 12/24 hour setting bug; 12/24 hour now reflects the pebble Time & Date setting;  Swapped config site for Pebble Clay (enabling faster and offline access to settings); Updates to package format to conform to SDK 3 format (for anyone who wants to help me refine and add features to this).

data.title: Jeep Time

changelog.release_notes: Casio CA-53W 1.1 - Display cleanup, menu icon fixed, and bluetooth vibration bug fixed (hopefully, will continue to test).
Casio CA-53W 1.0 - Initial release of my first watchface for the Pebble.

data.description:
Casio CA-53W - The Retro Calculator Watch for the Pebble

Step back into 80's and 90's pop culture with the Casio CA-53W, the retro calculator watch worn by Walter White from "Breaking Bad" and Marty McFly from "Back to the Future". Hand pixelated by myself, this Pebble watchface stays true to the original with every minute detail. From the location of each part of the time and date display to the text decorated around the watchface, I hope that you enjoy wearing this on your wrist, and possibly feel a little sense of nostalgia.

If you found an issue, please send me an email.

Features

 - Original retro display that includes day, hour, minute, second, and period
 - Date display mode from the original watch that shows by a quick shake, lasting three seconds
 - Bluetooth connectivity notification in place of the time signal notification of the original
 - Battery notification in place of the alarm notification of the original

latest_release.release_notes: Casio CA-53W 1.1 - Display cleanup, menu icon fixed, and bluetooth vibration bug fixed (hopefully, will continue to test).

data.title: Casio CA-53W

data.description:
Channel Split is a simple, yet super customizable watchface with subtle animations that is reminiscent of the early days of anaglyphic 3D experiences.

It has the following configuration options:
- Set the color of minutes and hours as well as the left and right channel
- Set the background color
- Vibration on Bluetooth disconnect
- Visual Feedback on Bluetooth disconnect
- Shake to view the date
  - Set date timeout
  - Set date format

Support us by buying this watchface after a trial period of 24 hours for 0.99 USD (+taxes). Payment will be handled by KiezelPay.

Design credits go to stegosaurusflex1. The used font is called "Lazer 84" from Juan Hodgson.

latest_release.release_notes: - Update to the KiezelPay library

data.author: Shane Porter

changelog.release_notes: Fixed issue where numbers less than 10 were not prefixed with a 0, causing an unacceptable time display!

Split up time layer into three layers: hours, minutes and separator (colon). 

Centred the separator, right aligned the hours, left aligned the minutes for an 'always-centred' time.

Featuring a large, easy to read digital display.
Day and date.
Battery indicator is orange ring on the outside of the watch face. When it's full, the battery is full. When the battery level goes down, so does the length of the arc.
Bluetooth ring is shown as a blue ring when connected.

data.description:
Rings is a digital watch face featuring easy to read, large numbers, as well as a day and date.

The core concept for 'Rings' is the two rings that enclose the design. 

The outermost, orange ring, represents the battery level. At 100%, the ring is complete. As battery level decreases, the arc reduces in length.

The innermost, blue ring, represents the bluetooth connection. When the connection is lost, a vibrate alert will also happen.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed issue where numbers less than 10 were not prefixed with a 0, causing an unacceptable time display!

data.title: Rings

data.author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.19: Straight line clock hands added in large and small size.

Version 1:18: Some more updates as follows:-
Step goal bar/circle fixed.
Option now added to display/hide second hand (no more shake to reveal second hand).
Two more clock hand shapes added in large and small size.

Version 1.16: Bug fixes to (hopefully) resolve the random reboots and crashes experienced by some users.
Manual step goal error fixed.
Step goal bar/circle now independent of the step counter for even more flexibility.

Version 1.15: Major additions and improvements!
Battery Bar option now under Controls at the top
NEW Left panel added for greater display flexibility
NEW Advanced settings section added!
-	Bezel Mode, Low Battery Mode and Night Mode now under Advanced Settings
-	Choice of two font sizes
-	Choice of two clock hand styles and sizes
-	Night Mode now triggered during local sunset and sunrise times
Version 1.12: Weather display and other improvements.
Version 1.11: Master Key (pmkey.xyz) support now included.
Version 1.10: Minor improvements to weather, update frequency, clock hands and custom text.

data.description:
BEACON = Bespoke Elegant Analogue ChrONometer
 
Powered by KiezelPay: $1.50 + local taxes after 48-hr trial
 
An analogue watchface you can customise to your individual needs!  With a unique stylish design, it comes packed with many features that you can pick and choose from as you wish, so it can look as simple or detailed as you want!
 
Features:-
- Invert or colour options, bluetooth indicator, vibration and date format options, show/hide second hand, battery bar and level and percent, day & week number, custom text
 - Digital time (display based on watch settings)
- Tick marks and/or digits
- Date displays language in user settings
 
Optimised for battery life:
- Health items updated every 15 min or shake
- Low Battery Mode: On defined level, health and weather will shut down to extend battery life.
 
Weather:
- Manual or automatic location ("Pebble" where no weather)
- Conditions, temp and high/low (C or F)
- Master Key (pmkey.xyz) support
 
Health:
- Steps, Sleep, Calories and Distance
- Step goal bar/circle from manual goal or history
- Heart Rate (BPM) where applicable
 
Other modes (now Advanced Settings from version 1.15):
- Bezel Mode: Enabled by default, can be removed for wider range of styles.
- Night Mode: Dark theme between local sunset and sunrise times.
 - Choice of two font sizes (from ver 1.15)
 - Choice of two clock hand styles (from ver 1.15)
 
Credits:-
- Font: Liberation Sans Bold under Public Domain Licence from Red Hat, Inc.
- Banner & other promo materials: Jervez Jno Baptiste at JPix
 
Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!!

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.19: Straight line clock hands added in large and small size.

data.title: BEACON

data.author: Vadim Podlesov

Release 1.2
Added WeatherUndeground and Yahoo provider.
User can use personal API key for weather update.
Weather doesn't disappear from watchface during updates.

Battery meter.
Seconds display per configuration.
Hour and Minutes color can be changed.
Temperature and conditions via OpenWeatherMap.
Initial Settings screen.

data.description:
Summary: Watchface with battery meter, digital and analog time and weather.

The digital time, weather conditions and current temperature is displayed in the center of watchface. The circle in center becomes thin and red (if display supports colors) as your battery drains. The second hand can be disabled for energy saving. Weather is updated twice an hour (not configurable yet). Weather source can be configured (OpenWeatherMap, WeatherUndeground or Yahoo). User can optionally specify own API key. Temperature units supported are metric and imperial. Color scheme can be configured.

latest_release.release_notes:
Release 1.2
Added WeatherUndeground and Yahoo provider.
User can use personal API key for weather update.
Weather doesn't disappear from watchface during updates.

data.author: Wiegand

changelog.release_notes: made big digital font also fat
Bahn changed their website, i changed the watchface. probably not the last release to this change but it seems to work for most common displays.
changed source of ether chart and little battery performance update
added bigger clock font, decent code improvements
added ether course as seen on kraken.
now ignores favorite picks that are more than 40 mins in future
reaction to changes on bahn.de code: fixed a problem that occured when scraping information on the successor information page, that opens if one clicks on the connection.
added new energy saving option called standby time. No transportation data will be downloaded during standby time.
reaction on change of the bahn.de sourcecode. --> bugfix

- einige ungereimtheiten im code beseitigt, die in seltenen f√§llen h√§tten fehler verursachen k√∂nnen
- verbesserung der darstellung auf time round

- Bug gefixt, wenn keine Favoriten eingegeben werden --> dann wurde keine Verbindung angezeigt
- sucht jetzt auch auf der n√§chsten Seite nach Versp√§tungen, wenn auf Haupt-Such-Seite ein Warndreieck angezeigt wird. Zeigt dann aber zwei Ausrufezeichen an

- Donate Button hinzugef√ºgt
- Limits der Slider f√ºr DB und Digitaluhr Anzeige erh√∂ht. Nun auch als pure Analoguhr nutzbar

Das Watchface √ºberwacht eine Bahn Pendler Verbindung dauerhaft und zeigt st√§ndig die n√§chste Bahn mit zugeh√∂riger Versp√§tung an. Ab einer selbst festzulegenden Uhrzeit wechselt die zu √ºberwachende Fahrtrichtung. Informationen die auf der Bahnseite mit einem Warndreieck markiert sind, werden von der App mit Ausrufezeichen markiert. Keine Informationen (wie z.B. bei Bussen) werden durch einen Punkt repr√§sentiert. Als Haltestellen kopiert man sich am besten den offiziellen Namen. Alles was auf der Bahnseite funktioniert sollte auch hier gehen. Bei der Wetteranzeige steht der 'km' Wert f√ºr die aktuellen Windgeschwindigkeiten. Das Watchface ist sehr individuell zu konfigurieren, bspw. kann die Analog Uhr ausgeblendet und die digitalen Anzeigen verschoben werden. Au√üerdem ist es m√∂glich die Farben zu invertieren.
F√ºr Verbesserungsvorschl√§ge bin ich offen.

data.description:
public transportation watchface for germany / europe. webscraper for deutsche bahn website.

Das Watchface √ºberwacht eine Bahnverbindung inklusive Versp√§tung und √§ndert Mittags(konfigurierbar) die Richtung. Vorkommnisse werden mit Ausrufezeichen keine Informationen mit einem Punkt symbolisiert. Als Haltestellen kopiert man sich am besten den offiziellen Namen. Alles was auf der Bahnseite funktioniert sollte auch hier gehen. Die Wetteranzeige gibt momentane Temperatur und Windgeschwindigkeit an. Alles ist sehr individuell einstellbar: Farben, Positionen etc. F√ºr Verbesserungsvorschl√§ge bin ich offen. 

Empfehlung: Wem dieses Watchface gef√§llt sollte sich unbedingt auch myBahn angucken: 
http://tinyurl.com/pebblemybahn
ich habe mir das auf einen hotkey gelegt. So hat man die Pendelverbindung immer in aktuell und zus√§tzlich eine Art PendelPanda falls es mal wo anders hin geht. Die App basiert auf dem gleichen Prinzip (sie holt sich ihre Informationen direkt von bahn.de und stellt diese kompakt auf der Pebble dar) und der Entwickler und ich m√∂chten in Zukunft zusammenarbeiten.

Fullscreen option for rectangular devices can be disabled (last screen). Adjust length and thickness of all hands. Adjust position and thickness of marks. Date can be applied either round or square. Enable bluetooth display, set appearance of sign and let the pebble vibe on disconnection

Probably more config is coming. Drop me a line if you miss something. Send your favorite setting as screen shot to kieselleger@mail.de

data.author: Turner Yey

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a bug in the wind speed for miles per hour.

data.description:
Straight forward watch face with quick info at your fingertips for your next jog or hike.

Top row from the left is temperature (C or F), humidity (%) and wind speed (kph or mph).

Bottom row is calories (kcal), step count (thousands) and distance walked (km or miles).

To change the units from imperial to metric, go into the Pebble phone app settings and change miles to kilometers.

Willie determines the weather based on your GPS coordinates which it detects on app install. To refresh the GPS coordinates, open the settings page and click "Save".

Weather info is powered by Yahoo! and is updated once an hour. If you get an error icon, the humidity indicates the error code (where 1~5: server error, 6: network error, 7: weather is null, 8: cannot parse response).

Additional options under settings:
- choose "feels like" temperature (chill factor)
- hourly vibration
- backlight on arm raise gesture (no more flicking!)
- leading zero for hour display

Health info powered by Pebble Health.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a bug in the wind speed for miles per hour.

data.description:
Say Hi to the Hungry Worm! This digital watchface features:

‚Ä¢       12 or 24-hour time based on Pebble settings
‚Ä¢       Day and Night Modes
‚Ä¢       Hourly weather updates from OpenWeather.org
o       Manually refresh the weather by navigating to another screen and back
‚Ä¢       The Bluetooth monitor will show ‚ÄúDisconnected‚Äù when the connection is lost.
‚Ä¢       The Hungry Worm is your battery meter! As your battery drains it will eat the apple and get larger. Give the watch a charge to see the cycle again!
‚Ä¢       Settings page will allow you to change temperature, set manual location for weather, and day color mode. After you save, just navigate to another screen and back to see the change. 

One-Time cost of $0.99 + local taxes after 7 day trial. Your contribution will help fund my education ( ò‚Äø ò)

data.author: David Morgan
data.description:
...it's a watchface.

TNM displays the time in a unique, rotary fashion. It's reminiscent of a famous, fully armed and operational battle station.

Outer ring is minutes. Middle ring is hour. Inner ring is battery. If you lose connection to the Pebble app the numbers all fade. Shake for the current date.


Options:
- Background color
- Hourly vibe
- Vibe on connection loss/restore
- Optional health integration to avoid vibes when you're sleeping

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release

data.title: That's No Moon

data.author: Nullbleed
data.description:
A simple, customizable watchface which displays date, time and battery in its hexadecimal representation.

Features:

- date (first row)
- weekday (second row in the middle in 24h mode, or first block in 12h mode)
- AM/PM indicator (second row last block in 12h mode)
- time (third row)
- connection state (fifth row first block)
- battery status (fifth row third block)

The connection is indicated by FF for connected and 00 for disconnected.

latest_release.release_notes:
Respect 12h/24h settings.
Minor fixes.

data.description:
Anery+ for Pebble Time 2.

Anery+ is based on BLISS TIME by Michael Reyes.

- Super precise, easy-to-read, analog clock face.
- Digital and analog watch faces.
- Display seconds in analog display by tapping or shaking watch.
- Show either weather or stock status on display.
- Timeline Quick View support.
- Hourly or half-hourly buzz.

Source available on GitHub.

Anery+ is available as "Bliss Time 2" for the OG Pebble, Pebble Time and Pebble 2 on apps.getpebble.com.

data.description:
My god, It's full of Pixels!

Full color watch face with simple design.

12x12 matrix pixels shows hours x minutes.

Row means minutes 0 to 60 with 5min step.
Column means hour 0(12) to 11.

1st image shows 7:25
2nd image shows 11:55
3rd image shows 3:05


You can also available following settings.

- Color Theme
- Pixel Size
- Battery Level 
 (show with upper gray rows number/ second image means 80%)
- Disconnect phone status
 (show with bottom gray 2 rows)
- Vibe hourly
 (you can also setting ahead of time, start/end hour)
- Disconnect Vibe
- Display Digit Time on Shake twice

data.author: Swarley
data.description:
An analog watchface goes digital.


Hours are sitting in the center, while the minutes orbit them.

The time is written in letters instead of numbers:
ON is 1, TW is 2, TH is 3, etc.

The date will be shown under the hours.
Also, the watch will now vibrate and show an icon on screen when it will disconnect from your phone.

Be sure to leave a heart if you liked this watchface, will be much appreciated.
Also, please share your thoughts, tell me if you would like to see some changes, or if you are experiencing any kind of bugs.

latest_release.release_notes: First Release.

data.author: Kiezel
data.description:
Kiezel Watchfaces | Text Time Bold

This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

Wear your watch boldly with our newest text based watch-face. Active and classy look without sacrificing the time and health features. The top shows your progress toward your step goal and your "typical" average indicator is visible as well.

Currently this face only supports English, sorry to all our foreign friends.

Features:
-Customize the colors (white on black, black on white)
-Customize step goal
-Toggle on/off the step bar
-Change bar at top to be battery
-Customize the fonts to be solid or outlined


Thanks and enjoy!

Team Kiezel-

data.author: microBob

changelog.release_notes: For those of you Pebble Time / Time Steel users... I finally figured out that your watch's "no-color" state is black... might be helpful eh?

data.description:
--UPDATE--
For those of you Pebble Time (Time Steel/Round) users... I finally figured out that your watch's "no-color" state is black... might be helpful eh?
--UPDATE--

Remember Power0? Yeah, that watchface that will save power but still let you have a cool look? Oh, and remember Power1? Uh-huh, that watchface that gave you some more information but still saved your power? Well, Power0+ is you combination of those two!
Power0+ displays your time the same way that Power0 did but now the date is displayed at the bottom and your battery level is displayed (in percents) at the top. These newly added figures are still in a font that uses as little pixel as possible to maximize the no-power-neededness of the Power watchfaces.

Please heart this watchface if you liked it, and please feel free to send feedback or suggestions for improvement.

Thanks!!
~MicroBob

latest_release.release_notes: For those of you Pebble Time / Time Steel users... I finally figured out that your watch's "no-color" state is black... might be helpful eh?

Looking for someone to brighten your day? Boris will do his best to do so. He roams the background of your watch and keeps you company throughout the day. He even goes to sleep when you tell him to. The remainder of the time he will be pulling pranks, taking showers, wrapping gifts, play the guitar and lots more.

Key features:
- Boris has more than 15 unique behaviours to brighten your day
- OpenWeatherMap integration based on city input (no GPS required)
- Sleep schedule for Boris
- Change background color
- Battery indicator using white line at the bottom

If you like Boris, please 'heart' it!! Thank you :)

Based on the desktop version of Boris, downloadable from:

no vibration during quiet time

data.description:
Cut/up has been created as response to a Reddit request made by /u/stegosaurusflex1 who conceived the "cutting edge" design.

The font is called "Peace Sans", designed by Sergey Ryadovoy.

If you want to be able to see more data in the same design, checkout the complementary watchapp: Cut/up+

* All colors are fully customizable (backgrounds, number colors, number borders, cutting line and cutting line borders).

* The cutting line doubles as a Bluetooth connection status indicator.

* Vibrations on Bluetooth connection loss and reconnection.

* Tapping the watch can show the date.

* The numbers can be moved up and down to further individualize the design.

* Animations can be disabled.

* Leading zeroes can be hidden.

* Hourly vibration can be enabled.

Shoutout to Christian Reinbacher who made a watchface based on the same design in parallel. We both liked the design so much that we decided to publish both versions.

Please remember to give the Watchface a "heart" if you like it. Thanks!

latest_release.release_notes:
slight animation improvements
no vibration during quiet time

data.title: Cut/up

data.author: bitrocklabs.com
data.description:
. Simple . Uncluttered . Tidy .

A clean watchface with a scrolling one-hour graph of your heartrate.

The bar graph depicts the last 60 records from your per-minute heartrate data. So if the watch has no data for that minute - in sleep mode, powered off, etc - then you will see an empty column.
data.title: Tidy HR Hourly Graph

data.author: JeroenDG
data.description:
Digital watchface that showsthe progress of the day and your current heart rate on a dial (0 to 200 BPM).

Configurable date and bluetooth/battery icons.

This is a 2 day free trial.
$0.99 in-app purchase afterwards.
data.title: HeartDial

data.author: Ken Caron
data.description:
Stay on target...

Simple watchface I made while learning Rocky.js. Animates in high FPS mode for 5 seconds, then slows down to once a second. I may update this with some simple improvements like customizable colors, larger text, date display, and more frames of animation. Requests welcome.


Keywords: Star Wars, Death Star
data.title: Targeting Computer

data.author: Ken Caron

changelog.release_notes: Finally added support for Pebble Time and Pebble 2.

* Finally fixes Clay bug for iOS devices
* Clay upgraded 
* Basalt and Diorite support coming soon

data.description:
Made with JavaScript using Rocky.js, this classic analog face takes inspiration from the Timex Expedition series of watches.

Features:

- Fully customizable colors
- Numeric Date Toggle

latest_release.release_notes: Finally added support for Pebble Time and Pebble 2.

data.title: Scout

data.author: Christian Reinbacher

changelog.release_notes:
- Support quiet time
- Show battery state in cutting line (optional)

Last update for today!
- Made visual feedback of BT disconnect separate from vibration setting

- Tweaked line thickness
- BW color on BT disconnect
- Adjustable "Readability"

- Background for minutes and hours can be set seperately
- Re-structure the settings page
- Added vibrate on BT disconnect option

- Public release?
- Added more configuration options
- Memory improvements

data.description:
Made due to a reddit request from /u/stegosaurusflex1 (who also gets the design credits). You can freely select the colors of hour, minute, background and seperator.

 Supports Timeline QuickView. The font is called "Peace Sans", made by Sergey Ryadovoy.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Support quiet time
- Show battery state in cutting line (optional)
